title: Nancy Wilson & Cannonball Adderley (Blue Note,1962)
description:
MP3/320kbps

Nancy Wilson&#039;s best set on record.The combination of Cannonball,Nat,and the inspiring rhythm section including the exquisite playing of Joe Zawinul along with Sam Jones on bass and Louis Hayes on drums makes for an historical performance.The band remains consistently inspired throughout.Pure passion and emotion shoot out at you with a heart-felt rendition of &#039; The Masquerade is Over&#039;,Teaneck,Never will I marry&#039; and Unit 7 to name a few, with excellent solos by Cannonball,Joe, and Nat and the sparkling swing of Louis Hayes brings it all together.

Personnel:
Nancy Wilson (vocal)
Cannonball Adderley (alto saxophone)
Nat Adderley (cornet)
Louis Hayes (drums)
Sam Jones (bass)
Joe Zawinul (piano)

Recorded in New York on June 27 & 29, 1961 and August 23-24, 1961.

Track listing:
1.Save Your Love For Me (Buddy Johnson) (2:38)
2.Never Will I Marry (Frank Loesser) (2:16)
3.The Old Country (Curtis Lewis & Nat Adderley) (2:57)
4.Happy Talk (Rodgers & Hammerstein II) (2:21)
5.The Masquerade Is Over (Magidson & Wrubel) (4:15)
6.A Sleepin&#039; Bee (Arlen & Capote) (2:32)
7.Little Unhappy Boy (Curtis Lewis) (2:14)
8.Teaneck (Nat Adderley) (4:30)
9.I Can&#039;t Get Started (Vernon & Gershwin) ( 4:55)
10.One Man&#039;s Dream (Zawinul & Wright) (5:09)
11.Never Say Yes (Nat Adderley) (3:57)
12.Unit 7 (Sam Jones) (6:04)
